p: The morphological features of all prepared materials were investigated by taking SEM images. No differences neither in particle size nor shape were observed with the increase of Eu 3+ concentration in synthesized compounds. The representative SEM images of Rb 2Bi(PO 4)(MoO 4):50%Eu 3+ specimen are given in Figure 2a,b. The figure demonstrates that powder consists of agglomerates, which are formed from smaller crystallites with broad size range. The shape of these crystallites is mostly rod-like. Figure 2c depicts the SEM image of the surface of Rb 2Eu(PO 4)(MoO 4) ceramic disk. The ceramic disk surface is formed from crystallites of various sizes. These crystallites are well grown together and form an even surface of the ceramic disk.
